TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 410
TEI.2.document_title: William P Harris to Stephen F Austin, 06-11-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: William P. Harris to Austin, June 11, 1830. Draft for $40.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 410

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*William P. Harris to Austin, June 11, 1830. Draft for $40.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Harrisburg */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-11-1830">11th June 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*Please pay to *person_mentioned*Messrs. Perry and Hunter*/person_mentioned* forty Dollars and charge the same to Account of the *location_mentioned*Steam Saw Mill*/location_mentioned* and oblige yours Respectfully,*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Wm. P Harris*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*$40.*/p* *p*Accepted. *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned*-*/p*
*/div1*
